paper_abstract: Recently, Zhou et al. proposed a quantum secret sharing (QSS) protocol, which provides only 25% qubit efficiency after the processes of the random sampling discussion and the secret derivation. This work proposes an enhancement of Zhou et al.'s protocol. With the technique of the Bell measurement, the improved Q SS protocol has 50% qubit efficiency.
paper_title: THE ENHANCEMENT OF ZHOU et al.'s QUANTUM SECRET SHARING PROTOCOL
